alert.note: Alert for De Kalb (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern De Kalb and northwestern Defiance Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Joe, or near Hicksville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hicksville around 555 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Farmer, Mark Center and Newville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
